headline.main: Rule Change Could Make Abe Longest-Serving Leader in Japan
headline.print_headline: Rule Change Could Make Abe Longest-Serving Leader in Japan

lead_paragraph: Japan's ruling party approved a change in party rules Sunday that could pave the way for Prime Minister Shinzo Abe to become the country's longest-serving leader in the post-World War II era.
snippet: Japan's ruling party approved a change in party rules Sunday that could pave the way for Prime Minister Shinzo Abe to become the country's longest-serving leader in the post-World War II era....
